Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Bleed air leak detection. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Pressurization component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
